Articles.Content:
> 
> Still no Mk1 inline cockpit interiors by what I'm seeing. Some one prove me wrong.

[Every crewable part in the game will have an IVA.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110529-Squadcast-Summary-%282015-02-14%29-The-Valenti-nope-Edition)

Happy landings!

> 
> [Every crewable part in the game will have an IVA.](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110529-Squadcast-Summary-%282015-02-14%29-The-Valenti-nope-Edition)
> Happy landings!

Yay. 

Sorry, I haven't been keeping up with the HYPE-news much.

I just noticed that i have two days off from work, 26th and 27th and at 28th i start work at 5 in the morning, guess i will do an allnighter with KSP 1.0

HYPE, HYPE, HYPE, HYPE
I have no job ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> I have no job ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

no job, no money, no worries ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Once a member created a topic like a time capsule where we posted our pics form KSP and made predictions for the game's future. Does anybody have a link?

Okay, THAT's more like it!

Shovel that hype-coal! Ignore those red signals! Go go go!

![Doge-1.0.png](http://alpha.renegrade.net/images/Doge-1.0.png)

> 
> I have no job ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I read that as "I have no jeb" initially (I thought.."rocket accident?"). Heh.

> 
> Okay, THAT's more like it!
> Shovel that hype-coal! Ignore those red signals! Go go go!
> 
> [http://alpha.renegrade.net/images/Doge-1.0.png](http://alpha.renegrade.net/images/Doge-1.0.png)

I love that picture so much ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D

> 
> I read that as "I have no jeb" initially (I thought.."rocket accident?"). Heh.

oh man. Never have I lost a Jeb. (using revert, of course. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )

I lost a Jeb... once.

Never again! (using revert, of course!)

Another time, a while ago, I stranded a Jeb for a good long while. But eventually got him back.

Can't wait for 1.0 to see what shinanigans Jeb, Valentina, and others get into this time!
4 more days... The thing that bugs me is that the videos are released very late in the day.

That's about when they usually do that stuff anyway.

I wonder what the average memory usage is for 1.0, now that the majority of the memory leaks are gone. Like, what's the actual normal memory usage for KSP.

> 
> I love that picture so much ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :D

Thanks. Hehe. I actually use a variant of that as my current in-game flag. I actually used the template for it that I saved to make it heh.

> 
> I wonder what the average memory usage is for 1.0, now that the majority of the memory leaks are gone. Like, what's the actual normal memory usage for KSP.

Average? Given that they probably haven't squished all of the memory leak bugs, it's hard to say. However, they also said they're loading DDS files, which have variable compression ratios depending on the specific version used - that could result in significant memory savings.

It will all be guesswork until 1.0 drops though.

I'm just glad to hear it'll take less memory. Now if only 64bit could exist....

also renegrade remember what I said earlier today about hitting 1100 today? I'm already past that ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I've been posting like crazy today! if I get to 1137 I will have posted 100 times today (not including forum games, which would add another 50 or so)

THIS WEEK NEEDS TO GET OVER WITH NAOW ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

Anyways,I'm gonna use the NEW Lab Module and make a Mun Base!

I'll call it "Mun Base Alpha!" (get it?!)
Boarding on: Cabin 01101000 01111001 01110000 01100101 (Translate it with a binary translator ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif))

If this train doesn't reach 100 posts before the end of the day, I'm gonna...

I'm gonna...

...do something...

BUT IT WON'T BE PRETTY

But really guys, bring on the hype! This is 1.0 for crying out loud!

I've checked the site 5 times today looking for the Countdown: 4 post, so I guess I'd better climb aboard the train. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
HYPE TRAIN CHOOOOOOO CHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!! bring on the hype bring on the hype.
This is my contribution to help the hype-train reach page 100 before 1.0 is out.
Only 4 days though. Trying to finish as much projects as possible. Making a flying car, ETC.

I post #MOREHYPE as often as I can. =)

Obsessively checking other threads for any new tidbits!
omg will they lift the embargo on the youtubers/testers/reviewers?? im so bored i would be happy to see manley playing 1.0

> 
> omg will they lift the embargo on the youtubers/testers/reviewers?? im so bored i would be happy to see manley playing 1.0

My bet is the embargo won't be lifted until the weekend, probably after squadcast.

> 
> My bet is the embargo won't be lifted until the weekend, probably after squadcast.

That's what I would expect, as well.

Happy landings!
When is the squadcast aired?

Squadcasts air on Friday at a random time, not even known to Maxmaps.

I'm already past that ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I've been posting like crazy today! if I get to 1137 I will have posted 100 times today (not including forum games, which would add another 50 or so)

Moar posts=moar hype?

Yay!
